36065.ここから 外に出られそうだ。\nレイダメテスの外に 出ますか？<yesno><c: I think I can get out of here.<yesno><close>

39119.旅の扉は チカラを失っているようだ。: Teleportal seems to be losing its power.

45140.台座に灯されていた 緑の炎が消えた。: The green flame lit on the pedestal went out.

45141.台座に灯されていた 赤い炎が消えた。: The red flame lit on the pedestal went out.

45142.台座に灯されていた 青い炎が消えた。:
Blue Fire, which was lit on the pedestal, went
out.

45143.どこか遠くで 重々しい振動が起こるのを感じた。:
I felt a heavy vibration somewhere in the
distance.

45386.緑に燃えるは 怨嗟の炎。\nすべての炎が消えし時 道は開かれん。:
Burning green is the Fire of Resentment, and
when all the flames are extinguished, the way
will be opened.

45387.赤に燃えるは 憎悪の炎。\nすべての炎が消えし時 道は開かれん。:
When all the flames are extinguished, the way
will be opened.

45388.青に燃えるは 絶望の炎。\nすべての炎が消えし時 道は開かれん。:
Burning blue is the Fire of Despair, and when
all the flames are extinguished, the way will
be opened.

45389.緑に燃えるは 怨嗟の炎。\nすべての炎が消えし時 道は開かれん。:
Burning green is the Fire of Resentment, and
when all the flames are extinguished, the way
will be opened.

45390.赤に燃えるは 憎悪の炎。\nすべての炎が消えし時 道は開かれん。:
When all the flames are extinguished, the way

45391.青に燃えるは 絶望の炎。\nすべての炎が消えし時 道は開かれん。:

all the flames are extinguished, the way will

45392.神殿レイダメテスは 不滅の要塞なり。\nたとえ 破壊されようとも 長き年月を経て:
Reidametes Temple is an immortal fortress. Even if it is destroyed, it will continue to exist, changing its form and shape over the
years.
